mapper.select: SELECT T1.VHC_MNGT_NO , T1.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , T1.VHC_MNGT_SN , T1.CARNO , T1.VHC_MNGT_OG_TP_CD , T1.VHC_PYMDT , T1.DSB_ENDDT , T1.VHC_MNGT_TP_CD , T1.INSR_AGE_CD , T1.RFLNG_CDNO_ENCR , T1.HIPS_CDNO_ENCR , T1.VHC_DSB_RMK_CN , (SELECT A.CARNM FROM TB_IFIN_SAP_EGBVC_DSB_RCV_ETXT A WHERE A.CARSEQ = T1.VHC_MNGT_NO) AS CARNM FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T1 WHERE T1.VHC_MNGT_NO = #{vhcMngtNo} AND T1.VHC_MNGT_SN = (CASE WHEN T1.VHC_MNGT_SN = 00 THEN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(MAX(T2.VHC_MNGT_SN)) FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T2 WHERE T2.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{vhcMngtNo}) ELSE TO_NUMBER(#{vhcMngtSn}) END) AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.CARSEQ , T1.OWSTAT , T1.CARNO , T1.CARNM , T1.CARDNO1 , T1.CARDNO2 FROM TB_IFIN_SAP_EGBVC_DSB_RCV_ETXT T1 WHERE 1=1 AND (TRIM(DDATE) IS NULL OR TRIM(DDATE) = '00000000') ORDER BY TRIM(CARNO)

SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T1 WHERE T1.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{vhcMngtPrtnrNo} AND (#{vhcPymdt} BETWEEN T1.VHC_PYMDT AND T1.DSB_ENDDT OR #{dsbEnddt} BETWEEN T1.VHC_PYMDT AND T1.DSB_ENDDT) AND ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T2 WHERE T2.VHC_MNGT_NO = #{vhcMngtNo} AND (#{vhcPymdt} BETWEEN T2.VHC_PYMDT AND T2.DSB_ENDDT OR #{dsbEnddt} BETWEEN T2.VHC_PYMDT AND T2.DSB_ENDDT) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
